stonerow.description: Stone Row Pub & Eatery is a restaurant in Jim Thorpe, PA. The owners needed a modern, easy to use website that got across the type of restaurant they are - one that's comfortable, homey, and casual, but still classy. In addition, they needed the site to be simple to update and take minimal upkeep. To fit these needs, the site is built on WordPress for easy updating, and has a modern yet comfortable look that fits the essence of what their restaurant is.

weiner.description: Richard Weiner is a wood carver and sculptor based in Philadelphia. He required a simple, clean website that was both easy for his clients to navigate and easy for him to update. The website is built on WordPress, making updating information easy to do. In addition, the design is simple with neutral colors to bring the color and workmanship of his sculptures to the forefront.
